content.p: Deputy Head of School of Pharmacy, Professor, Involved in the teaching of organic chemistry, analytical chemistry and medicinal chemistry to MPharm and Pharmaceutical and Health Sciences (BSc) students: PHAR1008 - Pharmaceutical and Biological Chemistry PHAR1011 - Dyspepsia PHAR1022 - Laboratory Studies in Pharmaceutical Sciences 1 PHAR1025 - The Fundamentals of Pharmacy PHAR2010 - Pharmaceutical Analysis and Spectroscopy (Module Leader) PHAR2012 - Laboratory Studies in Pharmaceutical Sciences 2 PHAR2014 - Concepts in Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Discovery PHAR2017 - Asthma, Allergies and Immune Diseases (Module Leader for UNM) PHAR2021 - Pain PHAR3014 - Medicinal Chemistry and Drug Design Natural Products Chemistry In our laboratory, we explore the flora of Malaysia for novel drug leads: isolation and structure determination of natural products possessing significant potential for application as therapeutic agents. We also pursue the total synthesis or semisynthesis of biologically active natural products. We carry out structural modification of natural products to understand the relationships between the molecular structure and its biological activity. We study natural products and novel structures for application in treatment of cancers, hypertension, and other disease-states. The major class of natural products that we are studying are alkaloids. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
